title: Enna Solla Pogirai Song Lyrics Kandukondain Kandukondain
stanzas:
Enna Solla Pogirai Song Lyrics Kandukondain Kandukondain
#ARRahman #ShankarMahadevan

illai illai solla,
oru kanam podhum
illai endru sollai,
thaankuvathendraal
innum innum enakkor
janmam vendum
enna solla pogiraayi.

anbe endhan kaadhal solla,
nodi ondru pothume
adhai naanum
meyppikkatthaane
oru aayul vendume

illai illai solla,
oru kanam podhum
illai endru sollai,
thaankuvathendraal
innum innum enakkor
janmam vendum
enna solla pogiraayi.

idhayam, oru kannaadi
unadhu bimbam vizhunthathadi
idhuthaan un sondham,
idhayam sonnathade

kannaadi bimbam katta
kayir ondrum illaiyadi
kannaadi oonchal
bimbam aadudhadi

nee ondru solladi penne
illai nindru kolladi kanne
endhan vaazhkkaiye
undhan vizhivilimbilennai
thuraitthaathe
uyir karaiyaeraadhe

vidiyal vandha pinnaalum
vidiyaadha iraivu edhu
poovaasam veesum
undhan koondhaladi

ivvulagam irunda pinnum
irulaadha baagam edhu
kadhir vandhu paayum
undhan kankaladi

pala ulaga azhagikal koodi
un paadham kazhuvalaam vaadi
yen thalirmalare
innum thayakkamenna
yennai puriyaadha
idhu vaazhvaa saavaa

ennai solla pogirai,
ennai solla pogiraayi,
nyaayamaa nyaayamaa
ennai solla pogirai,
ennai solla pogiraayi,
maunamaa maunamaa
